mapper.select: select b.menu_id,b.menu_right_id,b.role_menu_id,c.parent from security_role_menu a right join security_role_menu_right b on b.menu_id=a.menu_id left join security_menu c on a.menu_id=c.id where a.role_id=#{roleId}

select CONCAT(c.`code`,'.',d.`code`) as permission from security_role_menu a left join security_menu c on a.menu_id=c.id LEFT JOIN security_menu_right d ON a.menu_id=d.menu_id where a.role_id=#{roleId} ORDER BY a.menu_id
select CONCAT(c.`code`,'.',d.`code`) as permission from security_menu c LEFT JOIN security_menu_right d ON c.id=d.menu_id where c.type=1 and c.valid=1 ORDER BY c.id
